original: FOGELSTRÖM, Kurt Erik Ferdinand, Direktör, Saltsjöbaden, f Sthlm 00 av dir F Fo Hanna Göransson, gm Anna-Stina Peterson. Saltsjöb samsk, Sthlms hdlsgymn, kav:s off.asp.sk, Istljtn. Anst h Swedish Tobacco Co samt fma G Ekström New York 19—20, skeppsmäkl.fma Johannes Muller Lybeck 22, kassadir sed. 22 i F Fogelström AB (grund av fadern 97, speditions-, skeppsmäkleri-, be-fraktnings- o åkerifirma; speditör f Red.AB Nordstj). Led kommunalflm i Saltsjöb sed. 39, tax.nmd 39, luftsk.nmd sed. 42. Ordf Saltsjöb luftsk.frn, styr.led Saltsjöb luftförsv.-komm o Saltsjöb borgeri frn sed. 37. Organis Friv försv:s dag i Saltsjöb 41, 42 o 43. Resor: Tyskl 14, 22, USA 19—20, Engl 20—21. Medl Sthlms Istfrb, Livg t häst kamratfrn o Mer-curi-Schartauanerna. Sv riksluftsk.frbs ftjt, simmag g o em, skyt.m, skidl.m. Hobbies: Friv försv.arb, Skytte, simning, skidlöpning.
translated: FOGELSTRÖM, Kurt Erik Ferdinand, Director, Saltsjöbaden, b. Stockholm 1900, son of Director F Fo Hanna Göransson, m. Anna-Stina Peterson. Saltsjöb joint school, Stockholm Commercial College, cavalry officer in the reserve., Intelligence officer. Employed at Swedish Tobacco Co and G Ekström New York 1919-1920, shipbroker at Johannes Muller Lybeck 1922, treasurer since 1922 at F Fogelström AB (founded by father in 1897, a forwarding, shipbrokerage, freight and transportation company; forwarding agent for Red. AB Nordstj). Member of the municipal council in Saltsjöb since 1939, taxi committee member 1939, air defense committee member since 1942. Chairman of Saltsjöb air defense branch, board member of Saltsjöb air defense committee and Saltsjöb burglar's association since 1937. Organized the Volunteer Defense Day in Saltsjöb in 1941, 1942 and 1943. Travel: Germany 1914, 1922, USA 1919-1920, England 1920-1921. Member of Stockholm Ice-Skating Association, Life’s horse comrades and Mercuri-Schartau Association. Swedish National Air Defense Association's shooting, swimming and skiing champion. Hobbies: Volunteer defense work, shooting, swimming, skiing.

structured.name: Kurt Erik Ferdinand Fogelström
structured.description: Director, Saltsjöbaden. Born in Stockholm in 1900 to parents F Fo Hanna Göransson and Anna-Stina Peterson...
